definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: We should send these goods with defects back to the manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该把这些残次品退回厂家。

sentences.english: They are unable to prevent a small number of defective parts slipping through.
sentences.chinese: 他们没能阻止少数次品得以混过。

sentences.english: Four 12)raggedy excuses planted by the city.
sentences.chinese: 市政栽下充数的四棵残次品。

sentences.english: A brand new bottle cap-opening recycle machine for inferior beer products was designed successfully.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种全新的次品啤酒启盖回收机。

sentences.english: There is a minimal quantity of imperfection in the batch.
sentences.chinese: 这批产品的残次品极少。

sentences.english: American products are inferior to Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 美国产品比起日本的，是次品来着。

sentences.english: Laser test rejected one copy out of 40.
sentences.chinese: 激光测试工序挑出了四十份拷贝中的一个残次品。

sentences.english: If the defect rate is 1%, then the penalty rate will be 1% of the contract value.
sentences.chinese: 假如次品率是1%，那么赔偿率为合同总值的1%。

sentences.english: Four raggedy excuses planted by the city.
sentences.chinese: 市政栽下充数的四棵残次品。

sentences.english: There are many inferior porcelain vases in this batch whose causes we have to find out.
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷花瓶残次品太多，我们一定要找出问题所在。

sentences.english: All woollen sweaters in this cardigan show are famous Brands, and no. defective goods.
sentences.chinese: 本店羊毛衫展销，全为名牌，绝无次品。

sentences.english: He is going to bow and give them a quicky.
sentences.chinese: 他会鞠躬，然后给他们一个次品。

sentences.english: This jacket is actually a factory second, so it is quite inexpensive.
sentences.chinese: 夹克实际上是件残次品，所以价格低廉。

sentences.english: He tried to stick me with a bad radio.
sentences.chinese: 他试图向我兜售一台次品收音机。

sentences.english: The fewer the imperfections, the rarer and more valuable is the diamond.
sentences.chinese: 残次品更少，贵重的物品更稀有和更多是钻石。

sentences.english: The goods we ordered are of average quality, but you sent us inferior merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 我方订购的是大路货，而你方运来的却是次品。

definition: best quality/item of the highest quality/(slang) outrageous/annoying in the extreme/gross/person with these qualities
